articles.title: Kate's touching nod to sister Pippa at Anzac Day service - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Duchess of Cambridge, 40, wore a diamond brooch which featured a fern design identical to her sister Pippa's wedding tiara, which she wore in 2017.
articles.content:
The Duchess of Cambridge gave a touching nod to her sister Pippa at the Anzac Day service yesterday.

articles.title: From girl-next-door to Hollywood glamour! How the Downton Abbey cast transformed style - Daily Mail
articles.description: Experts told FEMAIL the success of Downton has seen the cast 'propelled to global superstardom' and their style on the red carpet last night in London reflected that.
